author: Syed Muthahar Saqaf
text:
SALEM

Sri Dasarathi Kaingarya Kaingarya Trust and Kinjitkaram Trust: ISKCON bhajan, 5 p.m.; Upanyasam by Velukkudi U. V. Krishnan Swami, Sumangali marriage hall, opposite Gandhi Stadium, 6 p.m.

Sri Shanmugha College of Engineering and Technology, Sankagiri: Graduation Day, Annual Day, and Sports Day and Alumni Meet, R. Jayavel, Director – Research, Anna University, Chennai, Marabin Maindan M. Muthaiah, C. P. Kanadasamy, DSP, and C. Paul Princely Rajkumar, RDO, speak,

10 a.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Thangam Pattu Maaligai showroom, 10 a.m. to

8 p.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

District Employment Exchange: Training programme for the Staff Selection Commission aspirants,

10 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Cooptex showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

Vivekanandha Institute of Engineering and Technology for Women: NSS special camp, inauguration, M. Karunanithi, Chairman, presides, Panchayat Union School, Kosavampalayam, 10.30 a.m.
title: Salem Engagement
